public class MazeBuilderBorukva extends MazeBuilder implements Runnable

    • getEdgeWeight

      public int getEdgeWeight​(int x, int y, CardinalDirection cd)
      This method returns the edgeWeight of the wall at the given position and direction.
      Parameters:
      x - - The x coordinate of the desired wallboard edge weight.
      y - - The y coordinate of the desired wallboard edge weight.
      cd - - The direction of the desired wallboard edge weight.
      Returns:
      - The edge weight of the wall at the supplied location.
